pages.title: DenLiner Isurugi
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O (2007, TV show)$(br2)Spawns throughout the Sands of Time$(br2)Chance to find $(l:den_o/mobs/urataros)Urataros$(/l) inside$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_ticket_rod)Rider Ticket Urataros$(/l)$(li)4-6 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (15%)$(li)3-7 $(l:den_o/items/rider_ticket)Rider Tickets$(/l) (50%)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_ticket_rod)Rider Ticket Urataros$(/l) (30%)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_ticket_pudding)Rider Ticket Pudding$(/l) (5%)
